page.title: 03Trades in Horncliffe.
page.content: We have J.H. Hepburn Esq.,Builder and Joiner/Glazier established in 1973. R. Goldie & Son,Builder & slater, a third generation building business now operated by R. Goldie Jnr. In the last year T. Cockburn Esq. has commenced as a Joiner in the village. G.Purvis & Son, Electrical Contractor and Television Rental Service.D.P.Watson Loanend,Joiner & Market Gardener. A.Deans Esq.Haulage Contractor. W.Robson Esq.,Chainbridge,Honey Farmer H.Mole Esq.,Plant Operator. R.Gray Esq .,Painter & Decorator,est.1975 L.Cockburn Esq.,Painter & Decorator. J.Heriot Esq.,Kitchen Manufacturer. Several self_employed men who are salmon-fishermen. Mrs E.Burgon who is Postmistress and Newsagent in the small but very essential Post Office. Continued on Page 4
